query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS blog_categories (
  id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  slug VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_slug (slug)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bdzn41uM6mMWcv.97707ddd6929 --database 3gcYftfyZmb2335Uoynmho --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS blog_categories (
  id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  slug VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  description TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_slug (slug)
);
